text: Alhaji Ahmad Tejan Kabbah (February 16, 1932 - March 13, 2014) was a Sierra Leonean politician, economist and lawyer. He was the third President of Sierra Leone from 1996 to 1997 and again from 1998 to 2007. He was born in Pendembu, Kailahun District. Kabbah died after a long illness on March 13, 2014. He was 82 years old. ==Related pages== *List of African scientists by country ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Economists Category:African lawyers Category:Muslims Category:Presidents of Sierra Leone Category:African scientists
title: Ahmad Tejan Kabbah
